meanings.definition: The quality of being respected and admired.
meanings.sent1: Her prestigiousness in the community was evident by the way everyone looked up to her.
meanings.sent2: The prestigiousness of the award ceremony made everyone excited to attend.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small stature, his prestigiousness in the field of science was undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The prestigiousness of the university was like a shining beacon for aspiring students.
meanings.sent5: The prestigiousness of her achievements shone brightly in the eyes of her peers.

meanings.definition: The state of having high status or reputation.
meanings.sent1: The company's prestigiousness in the industry attracted top talent.
meanings.sent2: His prestigiousness among his colleagues made him a natural leader.
meanings.sent3: The cat's prestigiousness in the household was evident by the way it demanded the best treats.
meanings.sent4: The prestigiousness of the castle was a symbol of the royal family's power.
meanings.sent5: The prestigiousness of the event made it the talk of the town.
